snippet.title: The Time Plague - Gameplay Trailer One
snippet.description:
It was the last years of the 19th Century, over three since you last heard from your friend, the Time Traveler when a mysterious parcel arrives in your small house in Whitechapel, London. The tale you are about to experience is the sequel to this unexpected arrival. Set across time and space, you must solve puzzles and battle enemies to restore the time line and reunite with your friend.

This is the first gameplay trailer showing one of the missions you will have to undertake to rescue your friend from the dreaded Morlocks!

The Time Plague is a Steam VR, First Person Shooter and is due to enter early access in Late 2023 with a full launch in Early 2024. To find us visit our website or search for "The Time Plague" on Steam to Wishlist us.

#TimePlague #VR #PCVR #steam #Annoucement #VRGaming #Steampunk #TimeTravel #FPS #Adventure #Puzzles
